New Records: LeBron James scored a career-high 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists (triple-double)
Domantas Sabonis tied Larry Bird with his 59th triple-double
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 16 points during a 21-0 Lakers run to open the 4th quarter
Anthony Davis drained a clutch 3 with 38 seconds left
De’Aaron Fox scored a 3-pointer with 7:43 left in the 4th quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Kings had the edge in the recent history of this intra-state rivalry
LeBron James was expected to lead the Lakers
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team’s effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first of five games on NBA League Pass featuring four of NBA.com’s MVP candidates to watch
The game was the Lakers' third win of the season, their first 3-0 start since 2010
Others: The game was played at Crypto.com Arena
